column1: spectral sensitivity functions for humans derived from photopigment spectral sensitivity adjusted for pre-receptoral filtering in a standard observer
as defined by Lucas et al., "Measuring and using light in the melanopsin age." Trends in Neuroscience, Jan 2014
Referenced by Well Building Standard v1 2016 which uses it to calculate equilivant melanopic lux (EML)
as defined by that standard, Appendix C Table L1 & L2
measurements should be taken as lux on the cornea

column9: standard observer pre-receptoral transmittance age 32 pupil undilated
